channel.title: Server Rights Problem
channel.description: I made a private server and I want to make my character the owner of the server...but everytime i change the rights to 3(owner) and save the changes, then log on...my rights are changed back to 0 and I can't do anything...any one know how to fix this?

item.title: Server Rights Problem
item.dc:creator: @Herr_Kraft Herr Kraft
item.description:
@Herr_Kraft wrote:

I made a private server and I want to make my character the owner of the server…but everytime i change the rights to 3(owner) and save the changes, then log on…my rights are changed back to 0 and I can’t do anything…any one know how to fix this?

Read full topic
